English.Text: Someone puts bandages around the wounds in a haphazard fashion, as if they were mere scratches. "Change the bandages every few days" is the advice, but the abcess that has formed beneath soon bursts and the vile infection spreads. He dies in his sleep. For the others, their negligence will forever remain a source of great shame, for no man is an island, and the death of each man diminishes the whole.
